Package jp.go.aist.six.oval.model.independent

Defines a Java object model for the OVAL Independent components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EntityItemEngineType The EntityItemEngineType defines a string entity value that is restricted to an enumeration.
EntityItemFamilyType The EntityItemFamily defines a string entity value that is restricted to a set of enumerations.
EntityItemHashTypeType The EntityItemHashTypeType restricts a string value to a specific set of values that specify the different hash algorithms that are supported.
EntityItemLdaptypeType The EntityItemLdaptypeType restricts a string value to a specific set of values that specify the different types of information that an ldap attribute can represent.
EntityItemVariableRefType The EntityItemVariableRefType defines a string item entity that has a valid OVAL variable id as the value.
EntityItemWindowsViewType The EntityItemWindowsViewType restricts a string value to a specific set of values: 32-bit and 64-bit.
EntityObjectEngineType The EntityObjectEngineType defines a string entity value that is restricted to a set of enumerations.
EntityObjectHashTypeType The EntityObjectHashTypeType restricts a string value to a specific set of values that specify the different hash algorithms that are supported.
EntityObjectVariableRefType The EntityObjectVariableRefType defines a string object entity that has a valid OVAL variable id as the value.
EntityStateEngineType The EntityStateEngineType defines a string entity value that is restricted to a set of enumerations.
EntityStateFamilyType The EntityStateFamily type defines a string entity value that is restricted to a set of enumerations.
EntityStateHashTypeType The EntityStateHashTypeType restricts a string value to a specific set of values that specify the different hash algorithms that are supported.
EntityStateLdaptypeType The EntityStateLdaptypeType restricts a string value to a specific set of values that specify the different types of information that an ldap attribute can represent.
EntityStateVariableRefType The EntityStateVariableRefType defines a string state entity that has a valid OVAL variable id as the value.
EntityStateWindowsViewType The EntityStateWindowsViewType restricts a string value to a specific set of values: 32-bit and 64-bit.
EnvironmentVariable58Item This item stores information about an environment variable, the process ID of the process from which it was retrieved, and its corresponding value.
EnvironmentVariable58Object The environmentvariable58 object is used by an environmentvariable test to define the specific environment variable(s) and process IDs to be evaluated.
EnvironmentVariable58State The environmentvariable state contains three entities that are used to check the name of the specified environment variable, the process ID of the process from which the environment variable was retrieved, and the value associated with the environment variable.
EnvironmentVariable58Test The environmentvariable test element is used to check an environment variable for the specified process, which is identified by its process ID, on the system.
EnvironmentVariableItem Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the environmentvariable58 item and will be removed in a future version of the language.
EnvironmentVariableObject Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the environmentvariable58 object and will be removed in a future version of the language.
EnvironmentVariableState Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the environmentvariable58 state and will be removed in a future version of the language.
EnvironmentVariableTest Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the environmentvariable58 test and will be removed in a future version of the language.
FamilyItem This element stores high level system OS type, otherwise known as the family.
FamilyObject The family object is used by a family test to define those objects to evaluate based on a specified state.
FamilyState The family state contains a single entity that is used to check the family associated with the system.
FamilyTest The family test is used to check the family a certain system belongs to.
FileBehaviors The FileBehaviors type defines a number of behaviors that allow a more detailed definition of a set of files or file related items to collect.
FileHash58Item The filehash58 item stores a hash value associated with a specific file.
FileHash58Object The filehash58 object is used by a file hash test to define the specific file(s) to be evaluated.
FileHash58State The filehash58 state contains entities that are used to check the file path, name, hash_type, and hash associated with a specific file.
FileHash58Test The file hash test is used to check a specific hash type associated with a specified file.
FileHashItem Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the filehash58 item and will be removed in a future version of the language.
FileHashObject Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the filehash58 object and will be removed in a future version of the language.
FileHashState Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the filehash58 state and will be removed in a future version of the language.
FileHashTest Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.8: Replaced by the filehash58 test and will be removed in a future version of the language.
Ldap57Item This item holds information about specific entries in the LDAP directory.
Ldap57Object The ldap57 object is used by an LDAP test to define the objects to be evaluated based on a specified state.
Ldap57State The ldap57 state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified entries in an LDAP directory.
Ldap57Test The LDAP test is used to check information about specific entries in an LDAP directory.
LdapBehaviors The LdapBehaviors defines a number of behaviors that allow a more detailed definition of the ldap_object being specified.
LdapItem This element holds information about specific entries in the LDAP directory.
LdapObject The ldap object is used by an LDAP test to define the objects to be evaluated based on a specified state.
LdapState The ldap state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified entries in an LDAP directory.
LdapTest The LDAP test is used to check information about specific entries in an LDAP directory.
Sql57Item The SQL57 item outlines information collected from a database via an SQL query.
Sql57Object The SQL57 object is used by a sql test to define the specific database and query to be evaluated.
Sql57State The SQL57 state contains two entities that are used to check the name of the specified field and the value associated with it.
Sql57Test The SQL test is used to check information stored in a database.
SqlItem Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.7: Replaced by the sql57 item and will be removed in a future version of the language.
SqlObject Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.7: Replaced by the sql57 object and will be removed in a future version of the language.
SqlState Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.7: Replaced by the sql57 state and will be removed in a future version of the language.
SqlTest Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.7: Replaced by the sql57 test and will be removed in a future version of the language.
TextfileContent Experimental: Is there any smart way to manage entities of OVAL Objects and States?
TextfileContent54Behaviors The TextFileContent54Behaviors defines a number of behaviors that allow a more detailed definition of the textfilecontent54 object being specified.
TextfileContent54Object The textfilecontent54 object is used by a textfilecontent test to define the specific block(s) of text of a file(s) to be evaluated.
TextfileContent54State The textfilecontent54 state contains entities that are used to check the file path and name, as well as the text block in question and the value of the subexpressions.
TextfileContent54Test The textfilecontent54 test is used to check the contents of a text file (aka a configuration file) by looking at individual blocks of text.
TextfileContentItem The textfilecontent item looks at the contents of a text file (aka a configuration file) by looking at individual lines.
TextfileContentObject Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.4: Replaced by the textfilecontent54 object and will be removed in a future version of the language.
TextfileContentState Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.4: Replaced by the textfilecontent54 state and will be removed in a future version of the language.
TextfileContentTest Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.4: Replaced by the textfilecontent54 test and will be removed in a future version of the language.
UnknownTest An unknown test acts as a placeholder for tests whose implementation is unknown.
VariableItem This item stores information about OVAL Variables and their values.
VariableObject  
VariableState The variable state contains two entities that are used to check the var_ref of the specified varible and the value associated with it.
VariableTest The variable test allows the value of a variable to be compared to a defined value.
XmlfileContentItem This item stores results from checking the contents of an XML file.
XmlfileContentObject The xmlfilecontent object is used by an XML file content test to define the specific piece of an xml file(s) to be evaluated.
XmlfileContentState The xmlfilecontent state contains entities that are used to check the file path and name, as well as the xpath used and the value of the this xpath.
XmlfileContentTest The xmlfilecontent test is used to explore the contents of an xml file.
 

Enum Summary
EngineEnumeration A set of valid database engines.
HashTypeEnumeration The hash algorithm enumeration.
LdapBehaviorsEnumeration The LDAP behaviors enumeration.
LdaptypeEnumeration The types of information that an LDAP attribute can represent.
TextfileContent.Entity  
 

Package jp.go.aist.six.oval.model.independent Description

Defines a Java object model for the OVAL Independent components.

OVAL Language
